summary: This code executes a Python script named "cookie_dumper.py" and then uses sed command to replace specific configurations in "config_demo.yaml" file with the ones found in "bilibili_cookies.sed". The updated configuration is saved as "config.yaml" under the "$poster_prefix".

details.comment: This code executes a Python script named "cookie_dumper.py" and then uses sed command to replace specific configurations in "config_demo.yaml" file with the ones found in "bilibili_cookies.sed". The updated configuration is saved as "config.yaml" under the "$poster_prefix".
